Golron II's underground pathways
These tunnels were crafted by Golron II, who spent many years forging the pathways we use today, while maintaining a firm economy and simultaneously keeping the evil monsters at bay. They stand as a testament to his engineering prowess and thoughtfulness during a time of great need. These paths are guarded by decree of the High King of Thunder Mountain to ensure his people will flourish in the riches of the mountain.
